Constant ARCH

pub const ARCH: &str = "x86_64";

A string describing the architecture of the CPU that is currently in use. An example value may be: "x86", "arm" or "riscv64".

Full list of possible values
  • "x86"
  • "x86_64"
  • "arm"
  • "aarch64"
  • "m68k"
  • "mips"
  • "mips32r6"
  • "mips64"
  • "mips64r6"
  • "csky"
  • "powerpc"
  • "powerpc64"
  • "riscv32"
  • "riscv64"
  • "s390x"
  • "sparc"
  • "sparc64"
  • "hexagon"
  • "loongarch64"
